[zc.buildout]
default = infi.recipe.console_scripts:Scripts
scripts = infi.recipe.console_scripts:Scripts
gui_script = infi.recipe.console_scripts:GuiScripts
gui_scripts = infi.recipe.console_scripts:GuiScripts
script = infi.recipe.console_scripts:Scripts

[gui_scripts]
gui-script-test = infi.recipe.console_scripts:nothing

[console_scripts]
console-script-test = infi.recipe.console_scripts:nothing

[distutils.commands]
install = infi.recipe.console_scripts:install
